Html:
Hi, I'm new to using the tree version of RAWR, but have been using for feral forever it seems.  I was wondering if the spell haste breakpoints are included in the Tree model currently.  It seems that haste is set as the worst stat for Trees and I was hoping that this would be adjusted at some point.  The reforging that it recommends is somewhat spurious and this would help me use the tool much more effectively.

Thank you for all the work on this and the other models.  I use this tool and it helps in making gear analysis much less painful.

It definitely covers haste break points.  Optimises will usually set you to either just over 916 haste in lower gear or the 2005 haste in better gear.   Other than reaching those points, haste is definitely the worst stat for resto.
